DelDialogBody.en: Do you want to delete this file ?

TripDelMessage.en: Do you want to delete this trip ?

PlaceRemovelDialogBody.en: Would you like to remove the last place from your trip?

CannotShareUnnamed.en: Trip cannot be shared, there are some unnamed places

PrivacyText.en: Set privacy on your trip. In Participants menu you can select admins of the trip.

ShareTripText.en: Share your trip on social networks and let your friends know about it. This will not allow anybody to edit your trip, or see your sensitive data. Basic trip overview only will be displayed.

ParticipText.en: Everbody who is invited on the trip will be able to see all information (except for private files). Users with "Can edit" authorisation can additionally edit all information.

WhenArrive.en: When are you going to arrive?
